about_the_game:
Couplinked is an unforgiving, open source, action-arcade game with a unique control system. Steer two balls through treacherous obstacles while trying to collect rings for points. Play with up to three of your closest friends in local co-op for some ball-busting fun!

Did we mention that Couplinked is difficult? Couplinked is DIFFICULT. Your balls are connected by LASERS...at least in the game. But don't worry! With multiple gameplay modes, a custom level editor, and over fifty handcrafted campaign levels, your tears of frustration will soon be washed away by the pure joy of knowing that everyone else sucks too. That's right. You're not alone, champ. We're here for you and we've got balls. Through the good and the bad, the thick and the thin, rest assured, you'll probably only be crying for the first day or so. It'll get better. You know Couplinked will treat you right. Awwww yeahhhhh.
detailed_description:
Couplinked is Open Source!

Couplinked is now open source! Click the "Open Source" button under the game's "Socials" menu to see the code!


About the Game

Couplinked is an unforgiving, open source, action-arcade game with a unique control system. Steer two balls through treacherous obstacles while trying to collect rings for points. Play with up to three of your closest friends in local co-op for some ball-busting fun! Did we mention that Couplinked is difficult? Couplinked is DIFFICULT. Your balls are connected by LASERS...at least in the game. But don't worry! With multiple gameplay modes, a custom level editor, and over fifty handcrafted campaign levels, your tears of frustration will soon be washed away by the pure joy of knowing that everyone else sucks too. That's right. You're not alone, champ. We're here for you and we've got balls. Through the good and the bad, the thick and the thin, rest assured, you'll probably only be crying for the first day or so. It'll get better. You know Couplinked will treat you right. Awwww yeahhhhh.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 2.8 GHz 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are only the specs that the game has been tested on. It's possible that you'll be fine with worse specs.

name: Couplinked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 2.8 GHz 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are only the specs that the game has been tested on. It's possible that you'll be fine with worse specs.

reviews:
“That's nice sweety.”
10/10 – My Mom

“If you're looking for an action/arcade game that is a tough nut to crack, take a look at Couplinked. The game will drive you nuts but in a challenging, 'I can't believe it's that hard' fashion.”
Windows Central
short_description: Couplinked is an unforgiving, open source, action-arcade game with a unique control system. Steer two balls through treacherous obstacles while trying to collect rings for points. Play with up to three of your closest friends in local co-op for some ball-busting fun!
